svg: <% max = data.nsort.reverse.0 || 1 %> <% FOREACH week IN [0 .. data.size-1] %> <rect x="<% width = (170 / data.size).int; week * width %>" y="<% h = data.${week} / max * 20; 20 - h %>" width="<% width - 1 %>" height="<% h %>" style="fill:#36C; fill-opacity:0.3" /> <rect x="<% week * width %>" y="21" width="<% width - 1 %>" height="1" style="fill:#36C; fill-opacity:0.6" /> <% END %>
